caption.title: For network 1 with random seeding the mean prevalence over time is depicted under random seeding on network 1 for the 3 scenarios with the same overarching propagation likelihood (λ = 0.192).
caption.p: The baseline scenario, the red open circles, a process with homogeneous sub-processes ( α = ϕ = η = 0.5769). Scenario 5, the green triangles, a process with α = 1.0, ϕ = 1.0 and η = 0.192. Scenario6, blue pluses, a process with α = 0.2, ϕ = 1.00 and η = 0.96. During the simulation at t = 25 an intervention (reduction of 0.2) in the radiation is applied.
